member.name: T:Licensing.HashGenerator
member.summary: Provides an interface to the hashing functions and asymmetric signature checking.

member.summary: Computes a signature for the given hash using the private key.
member.param: The hash of the original message
Private key to use for signing

member.summary: Checks the signature for a given hash.
member.param: The hash of the original message

member.summary: Computes the hash for a License.

member.summary: Computes the hash for a Json-Object.

member.summary: Computes the hash for a string.

member.name: M:Licensing.HashGenerator.ComputeHash(Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JToken)
member.summary: Computes the hash for a Json-Token.

member.name: M:Licensing.HashGenerator.GetUnifiedJsonStringFromString(System.String)
member.summary: Constructs a unified Json string with identifies the given JToken (will first be parsed) and does not change with differing sorting orders in JObject collections.

member.name: M:Licensing.HashGenerator.GetUnifiedJsonString(Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JToken)
member.summary: Constructs a unified Json string with identifies the given JToken and does not change with differing sorting orders in JObject collections.
member.param: JToken to generate unified json string for

member.summary: Returns true when obj contains a license cache of a pre 1.2 version.

member.summary: Computes a signature for the given hash using the private key.
member.param: The hash of the original message
Private key to use for signing

member.summary: Checks the signature for a given hash assuming a pre 1.2 version.
member.param: The hash of the original message

member.summary: Computes the hash for a License using the pre 1.2 hashing function.

member.name: M:Licensing.HashGenerator.UnlockHashingMethods(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Unlocks the hashing methods. This method must be called before initializing a Licenser.
member.param: Path to search for the "Hashing.dll" file

member.name: M:Licensing.HashGenerator.UnlockHashingMethods(System.String)
member.summary: Unlocks the hashing methods. This method must be called before initializing a Licenser. Searches the application dir for the "Hashing.dll" file.

member.name: M:Licensing.HashGenerator.HashingMethodsUnlocked
member.summary: Returns true when the hashing methods have been unlocked.

member.name: T:Licensing.License
member.summary: Represents a license.

member.name: P:Licensing.License.LicenseFile
member.summary: Path to the license file in cache.

member.name: P:Licensing.License.LicenseKey
member.summary: Immutable identification of the license.

member.name: P:Licensing.License.Binding
member.summary: Current Binding for the license.

member.name: P:Licensing.License.BindingId
member.summary: Current BindingId for the license.

member.name: P:Licensing.License.CanExpire
member.summary: Returns whether the license can expire.

member.name: P:Licensing.License.ExpirationDate
member.summary: Last date when the licenses can be used. Throws an InvalidOperationException when CanExpire is false.

member.name: P:Licensing.License.LastCheckDate
member.summary: DateTime when the license was last checked online.

member.name: P:Licensing.License.IsOfflineLicense
member.summary: Returns whether the license is an offline license. This means the NextCheckDate property is set and overrides the local cache expiration policy.

member.name: P:Licensing.License.NextCheckDate
member.summary: DateTime when to check the license again. This overrides the local cache expiration policy.

member.name: P:Licensing.License.ExtraData
member.summary: Application specific data about the license.

member.name: P:Licensing.License.IsLegacyLicense
member.summary: Returns true when this instance contains a license of a pre 1.2 version.

member.name: M:Licensing.License.UpdateLicense(Licensing.License)
member.summary: Sets the last checked date to today and copies the additional data from prototype

member.name: M:Licensing.License.IsExpired
member.summary: Returns wether the license has expired.

member.name: M:Licensing.License.IsCacheExpired(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns wether the license has not been checked online within a given time. Will return false if the last check date lies in the future. The application should not accept licenses whose cache is expired.
member.param: When set to false, the next check date will be ignored.

member.name: M:Licensing.License.IsValid(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns wether the license can be used at the current time.
member.param: When set to false, the next check date will be ignored.

member.name: M:Licensing.License.MakeOffline(System.String,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Convert the license to an offline license.
member.param: BindingId to lock the license to
Next date to force license checking

member.name: M:Licensing.License.UpdateSignature(System.String)
member.summary: Update the license signature after changes have been made.

member.name: M:Licensing.License.WriteToFile(System.String)
member.summary: Writes the license to a file.

member.name: M:Licensing.License.ToString
member.summary: Returns the Json representation of this license.

member.name: M:Licensing.License.ReadFromFile(System.String)
member.summary: Reads a license from a file and checks for integrity.

member.name: M:Licensing.License.ReadFromJsonCache(Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JObject)
member.summary: Reads a license from a json object and checks for integrity.

member.name: M:Licensing.License.ReadFromLicenseServerResponse(Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JObject)
member.summary: Reads a license from a license server response and checks for integrity.

member.name: M:Licensing.License.MakeOfflineLicense(System.String,System.String,Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JObject,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Create a new license with the given arguments for offline usage.

member.name: T:Licensing.LicenseStates
member.summary: Describes the different states a license can be in.

member.name: F:Licensing.LicenseStates.Invalid
member.summary: The license is invalid.

member.name: F:Licensing.LicenseStates.NotCached
member.summary: A suitable license was not found in the cache.

member.name: F:Licensing.LicenseStates.CacheExpired
member.summary: The license has not been synced with the license server in a while.

member.name: F:Licensing.LicenseStates.LicenseExpired
member.summary: The license is expired.

member.name: F:Licensing.LicenseStates.BoundElsewhere
member.summary: The license is bound to another binding id.

member.name: F:Licensing.LicenseStates.BindingLimitReached
member.summary: The license is bound to too many other binding ids.

member.name: F:Licensing.LicenseStates.KeyNotValid
member.summary: The entered license key is not valid.

member.name: F:Licensing.LicenseStates.Valid
member.summary: The license is valid an can be used.

member.name: T:Licensing.DetachLicenseResults
member.summary: Possible results for detach license calls.

member.name: F:Licensing.DetachLicenseResults.Invalid
member.summary: The returned response was not valid.

member.name: F:Licensing.DetachLicenseResults.Success
member.summary: The license has been detached.

member.name: F:Licensing.DetachLicenseResults.NotAvailable
member.summary: The binding exists but cannot be detached at the moment.

member.name: F:Licensing.DetachLicenseResults.LicenseNotFound
member.summary: The license key was not found.

member.name: F:Licensing.DetachLicenseResults.BindingNotFound
member.summary: The license binding does not exist.

member.name: T:Licensing.RequestDemoKeyResults
member.summary: Possible results for a demo key request.

member.name: F:Licensing.RequestDemoKeyResults.Error
member.summary: An unknown error occured.

member.name: F:Licensing.RequestDemoKeyResults.Success
member.summary: The demo key was sent to the given E-Mail address.

member.name: F:Licensing.RequestDemoKeyResults.DemoAlreadyUsed
member.summary: A demo for this application was already used by this customer.

member.name: F:Licensing.RequestDemoKeyResults.NoDemoAvailable
member.summary: Demo keys are not available for this application.

member.name: F:Licensing.RequestDemoKeyResults.CustomerRegistrationFailed
member.summary: An error occured while registering the customer.

member.name: P:Licensing.CustomerData.Name
member.summary: Name or company of the customer.

member.name: P:Licensing.CustomerData.EMail
member.summary: Contact E-Mail address.

member.name: P:Licensing.CustomerData.Phone
member.summary: Contact phone number.

member.name: P:Licensing.CustomerData.City
member.summary: City of the customer or company.

member.name: P:Licensing.CustomerData.Zip
member.summary: Zip code of the city.

member.name: P:Licensing.CustomerData.Street
member.summary: Street and house number of the customer or company.

member.summary: Creates a new customer from base data.

member.name: T:Licensing.Licenser
member.summary: Manages the local license cache, license validation and license server communication.

member.name: P:Licensing.Licenser.Log
member.summary: Gets or sets the log used by the Licenser and all helper classes.

member.name: P:Licensing.Licenser.LicensesPath
member.summary: Returns the local license cache directory.

member.name: P:Licensing.Licenser.DeviceId
member.summary: Gets the device id of the local machine.

member.name: P:Licensing.Licenser.AllowOfflineLicenses
member.summary: Gets or sets if the licenser will accept offline licenses.

member.name: P:Licensing.Licenser.Licenses
member.summary: Gets a list of all installed licenses. This list may contain expired or invalid licenses.

member.name: M:Licensing.Licenser.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new Licenser given the application and system parameters.
member.param: Local directory path to store the registered licenses
The application name as registered in the "Name"-Column in the license portal
The Address of the license server

member.name: M:Licensing.Licenser.ReloadLicenses
member.summary: Loads all licenses from the local storage. All unsaved changes to previously loaded licenses are lost.

member.name: M:Licensing.Licenser.SaveLicenses
member.summary: Writes all licenses back to the local storage. Has only to be executed when licenses are changed.

member.name: M:Licensing.Licenser.SaveLicense(Licensing.License)
member.summary: Writes the license to the local storage and re-uses the previous filename. When the license is not in storage yet, a random filename is generated.

member.name: M:Licensing.Licenser.DeleteLicenseFromCache(Licensing.License)
member.summary: Deletes the local cache for the license.

member.name: M:Licensing.Licenser.DetachLicense(Licensing.License,System.DateTime@)
member.summary: Detaches the binding from the given license if available. When DetachLicenseResults.NotAvailable is returned, availableAt will be set to the next possible date for detaching.
member.param: The DateTime from when detaching is available

member.name: M:Licensing.Licenser.GetCachedLicense(Licensing.Binding,Licensing.License@)
member.summary: Tries to get a license from the local storage bound to the given id. This method will not check online for licenses.
member.param: The license from local storage. Will be set, unless LicenseStates.NotCached is returned.

member.name: M:Licensing.Licenser.GetValidCachedLicenses(Licensing.Binding)
member.summary: Returns an array of all installed, valid licenses bound to the given binding id.

member.name: M:Licensing.Licenser.GetValidCachedLicenses
member.summary: Returns an array of all installed, valid licenses.

member.name: M:Licensing.Licenser.RegisterLicense(System.String,Licensing.Binding,Licensing.License@)
member.summary: Checks online for the license key. Also acquires a binding to the given binding id and stores it in the local cache. The result is verified by CheckLicense and can be used for activation.
member.param: License key to query the server for.
Acquires a binding to this binding id.
The downloaded license. Will be set, unless LicenseStates.KeyNotValid is returned.

member.name: M:Licensing.Licenser.GetLicenseState(Licensing.License)
member.summary: Returns the license state of the license. This method does not reload attached information from the license server.

member.name: M:Licensing.Licenser.RequestDemoKey(Licensing.CustomerData)
member.summary: Register a new customer and order a demo key for the application of the licenser. The key will be sent to the customers E-Mail address.

member.name: M:Licensing.Licenser.SendPostRequest(System.String,System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)
member.summary: Send Post request to license server.

member.name: M:Licensing.Licenser.CheckSystemTime
member.summary: Checks wether the current system time might have been changed to fool the licensing system.

member.summary: Returns true when a valid license was found.

member.summary: Returns a valid license. Null when Success is false.

member.name: P:Licensing.AcquireLicenseArgs.Exception
member.summary: Returns an Exception object if unexpected errors have occured, otherwise null.

member.name: M:Licensing.AcquireLicenseArgs.#ctor
member.summary: Creates an unsuccessfull result without an unhandled exception.

member.name: M:Licensing.AcquireLicenseArgs.#ctor(Licensing.License)
member.summary: Creates a successfull result with attached license.

member.name: M:Licensing.AcquireLicenseArgs.#ctor(System.Exception)
member.summary: Creates an unsuccessfull result caused by an unhandled exception.

member.name: P:Licensing.DetachLicenseBindingArgs.Success
member.summary: Returns true when a valid license was found.

member.name: P:Licensing.DetachLicenseBindingArgs.License
member.summary: Returns a valid license. Null when Success is false.

member.name: P:Licensing.DetachLicenseBindingArgs.Exception
member.summary: Returns an Exception object if unexpected errors have occured, otherwise null.

member.summary: Creates a successfull result with attached license.

member.name: M:Licensing.DetachLicenseBindingArgs.#ctor(Licensing.License,System.Exception)
member.summary: Creates an unsuccessfull result caused by an unhandled exception.
member.param: The license which should be detached.

member.name: T:Licensing.UserInteraction
member.summary: Provides a default user interface for standard operations.

member.name: T:Licensing.UserInteraction.Win32WpfWindow
member.summary: Wrapper class to set a Wpf-Window as owner of a Windows Form.

member.name: P:Licensing.UserInteraction.DefaultThreadInvoker
member.summary: Default function to invoke when accessing the UserInteraction class from the STA thread. Use this delegate to run a worker in your application context.

member.name: P:Licensing.UserInteraction.StaThreadInvoker
member.summary: Function to invoke a worker in the STA thread. Will start a new STA thread by default. Use this delegate to run a worker in your application context.

member.name: P:Licensing.UserInteraction.ShowRequestDemo
member.summary: Gets or sets whether a button to create a demo license should be shown in the enter license dialog.

member.name: P:Licensing.UserInteraction.OwnerWindow
member.summary: The owner window for all dialogs.

member.name: M:Licensing.UserInteraction.SetOwnerFromWpfWindow(System.Windows.Window)
member.summary: Set the owner window from a Wpf Window.

member.name: M:Licensing.UserInteraction.BeginAcquireLicense(Licensing.Licenser,Licensing.Binding,Licensing.AcquireLicenseCallback)
member.summary:
Calls AcquireLicense in a separate thread and invokes the given callback afterwards.
Make sure to set the UI environment before calling this method.
member.param: The licenser to use for activation
The Binding-ID to register or check the license

member.name: M:Licensing.UserInteraction.AcquireLicense(Licensing.Licenser,Licensing.Binding,Licensing.License@)
member.summary:
Reads a license from cache and checks it for validity. If no license is found, the user will be prompted to enter one. This method can be used as single entry point for license checking. When this method returns true, the returned license can be used.
Make sure to set the UI environment before calling this method.
member.param: The licenser to use for activation
The Binding-ID to register or check the license

member.name: M:Licensing.UserInteraction.RequestDemo(Licensing.Licenser)
member.summary: Opens a dialog to request a demo key for the given licensers application. Returns true when a key was successfully requested.

member.name: M:Licensing.UserInteraction.BeginDetachLicenseBinding(Licensing.Licenser,Licensing.License,Licensing.DetachLicenseBindingCallback)
member.summary:
Detaches the license binding and displays a result message. Invokes the given callback afterwards.
Make sure to set the UI environment before calling this method.
member.param: The licenser to use for activation

member.name: M:Licensing.UserInteraction.DetachLicenseBinding(Licensing.Licenser,Licensing.License)
member.summary:
Detaches the license binding and displays a result message. Returns true when the binding was detached, otherwise false.
Make sure to set the UI environment before calling this method.
member.param: The licenser to use for activation

member.name: M:Licensing.UserInteraction.GetLicenseStateMessage(Licensing.LicenseStates)
member.summary: Returns the localized message for a given license state.
member.param: The license state to return a localized message for

member.name: M:Licensing.UserInteraction.GetDetachLicenseResultMessage(Licensing.DetachLicenseResults)
member.summary: Returns the localized message for a given detach license binding response.
member.param: The response to return a localized message for

member.name: M:Licensing.UserInteraction.GetRequestDemoKeyResultMessage(Licensing.RequestDemoKeyResults)
member.summary: Returns the localized message for a given demo request response.
member.param: The response to return a localized message for
